parameters.name: consumerAuthorizationRuleId
parameters.description: The string that is used to filter routes based on consumer authentication rules. Only authorized APIs are returned.

parameters.name: deployStatuses
parameters.description:
The deployment state of the route.

Enumerated values:

*   Deploying: The route is being deployed.
*   DeployedWithChanges: The route is deployed and modified.
*   Undeploying: The route is being undeployed.
*   NotDeployed: The route is not deployed.
*   Deployed: The route is deployed.
*   UndeployFailed: The route failed to be undeployed.
*   DeployFailed: The route failed to be deployed.

parameters.name: domainId
parameters.description: Specifies to filter routes by domain ID.

parameters.name: gatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the Cloud-native API Gateway instance.

parameters.name: nameLike
parameters.description: The route name keyword for a fuzzy search.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The page number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: pathLike
parameters.description: The route path keyword for a fuzzy search.

parameters.name: withAuthPolicyInfo
parameters.description: The consumer authorization information in the response.

parameters.name: withConsumerInfoById
parameters.description: The authentication rules of the specified consumer in each route returned.

parameters.name: withPluginAttachmentByPluginId
parameters.description: The mounting information of the specified plug-in in each route returned.
